item.description:
At this photoshoot you will work with dramatic studio lighting. There will be two studio lighting setups for this shoot: first setup with one hot light + natural light from a side window and the model will be posing on a day-bed. second setup will be stage lights with model posing in front of black background. To attend this photoshoot you need fast lens f2.8 or faster, and the focal length of the lens should be between 35mm to 70mm. Email me if you have more questions.

More information on the model:

http://www.modelmayhem.com/1154401
item.why: First artistic nude shoot with Phylactère. The model originally from Paris, currently living in Montreal. She will visit Boston on May 25th and 26th. This photoshoot is from 7:30 PM to 10:30 PM on May 25th, and is limited to 3 or 4 photographers max.
item.name: Artistic nude shoot with Phylactère
